text: Satyara ahbana te'omrae'i. Yisakale te'omra bahirae anaka ahbana karae, sihamte sihamtara ahbanata akano samharai nidiye. Baram sihamtara drstanta se'i byaktira darae, yijane panira babe hata pati panika ahbana karae tara mukhata paraibalai athaca tara mukhata ahi paraibalai panira kono sakti na'i, arau kaphirasakalara ahbana kerala bhrastatate'i nipatita
